title: Learning React with Vite
body: Vite is a fast build tool that makes React development much easier.

title: Why Tailwind CSS is Popular
body: Tailwind allows you to style directly in your markup using utility classes.

title: Understanding useEffect
body: The useEffect hook lets you run side effects like data fetching.

title: Component-Based UI
body: React apps are built using small reusable components.

title: Fetching Data in React
body: You can fetch APIs using fetch or axios inside useEffect.

title: Frontend Project Ideas
body: Simple projects help reinforce JavaScript and React fundamentals.
